guidelines.title: Mandir Guidelines
guidelines.subtitle: Rules & Information
guidelines.intro: To ensure a peaceful and spiritual experience for everyone, we kindly request all devotees to follow these guidelines during their visit to Shree Panchasara Parivar Mandir.
guidelines.footer: Thank you for your cooperation in maintaining the sanctity of our temple.

general.title: General Rules
rules: Please maintain silence inside the temple premises.
Mobile phones should be switched off or kept on silent mode.
Photography and videography are strictly prohibited inside the main sanctum.
Footwear must be kept in the designated footwear area outside.

etiquette.title: Darshan Etiquette
rules: Please stand in the designated queues during peak hours.
Proper traditional attire is recommended while visiting the temple.
Offerings should be handed over to the priests at the designated counter.
Maintain a respectful distance from the idols and other devotees.

safety.title: Safety & Hygiene
rules: Help keep the temple clean by disposing of waste in bins provided.
Supervise children at all times near the temple premises.
Follow the instructions provided by temple volunteers and security staff.
